claim:
We also generated a word cloud from the title of published journal articles where the datasets were first reported (or the dataset title if no journal article was available), which provides information on the type of studies that make up our dataset collection (
Figure 1).
title: Figure 1.  Word cloud generated from the title of published journal articles where the datasets were first reported, or the dataset title if no journal article was available.
caption: The word size is proportional to the frequency of each word.
